resources.title: Tumbleweird
resources.description:
Tumbleweird exists to bring together a more diverse, creative, and progressive community than Eastern Washington gets credit for, in order to connect, highlight, and encourage the betterment of our area.

We do this by publishing a community-driven paper that uncovers the region’s true identity in a way that’s always positive, often irreverent, and never timid.

resources.title: Hot Mess Burgers & Fries
resources.description:
A rebel burger shop out of a little truck in Downtown Kennewick! Our burgers are what happens when chefs with over 40 combined years culinary experience run a food truck.

Buns baked fresh everyday, American cheese made from scratch, our own ketchup recipe and so much more sets these apart from your normal burger experience!

Also-queer owned. Our Trans-woman executive chef and owner has made sure that this is a safe place for all to show up as their authentic selves!

resources.title: PFLAG Benton-Franklin Resources
resources.description: A ton of resources ranging from counseling and medica services, tattoo artists, professional services, social media groups, and third spaces

resources.title: Spectrum Counseling's LGBTQIA2+ Resource List
resources.description: Several local and national resources maintained by Dr. Kade Sharp

resources.title: The Trevor Project
resources.description: If you are thinking about harming yourself — get immediate crisis support. Connect to a crisis counselor 24/7, 365 days a year, from anywhere in the U.S via text, chat, or phone. The Trevor Project is 100% confidential and 100% free.

resources.title: Blackthorne Neighborhood Pub
resources.description: An all ages space with food and drinks (alcohol optional), that welcomes queer folks and actively advocates for acceptance and the removal of bullying and harassment from the establishment. Regularly has live music, trivia, karaoke, board gaming, and other events to encourage fraternization.

resources.title: The Emerald of Siam
resources.description: The Emerald of Siam is a Live Music Venue and Thai Restaurant located in Uptown Richland, and Tri City Cultural Hub. Most of the menu is gluten-free, dairy-free, and msg-free and they offer a variety of proteins and have many vegetarian and vegan options. Events include dinner shows and late night performances along with trivia, open mic nights, and jazz and acoustic music nights. The Emerald of Siam has a strong community focus and they treat everyone like family.

resources.title: Aub's Lounge
resources.description:
Aub’s Lounge is your go-to social hub for adults right here in Tri-Cities! A non-alcoholic space just for us! We’re home to Aub’s Bananza Bread—gourmet banana bread with a rotating menu featuring over 30 unique flavors. A Spoken Space: Poetry/Open Mic, created by Impact Poet Ms. Jurudawise, is hosted here every week.

Aub's Sumptuous Soups are available weekly as well with a rotating menu of gourmet, made-from-scratch soups. Plus, we offer occasional Dinner and a Show specials that are perfect for an unforgettable night out.

At Aub's Lounge, we host several events each month that provide a refreshing alternative to traditional bar scenes—fostering genuine human connection and creating unforgettable experiences. This is also a stunning event venue loved by those who book private events or even hold photoshoots here!

With cozy seating, a reading nook, and an intimate stage for self-expression, it’s the perfect place to unwind, connect, and have fun.

resources.title: Tri-Cities Pride
resources.description: Tri-Cities Pride is a 501(c)(3) volunteer non-profit organization that strives to empower and celebrate all lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and queer citizens of the Tri-Cities and the surrounding communities, while promoting acceptance and tolerance through service, outreach, and education.

resources.title: Tri-Cities LGBTQ+ Calendar
resources.description: A queer-focused calendar maintained by a few people, with a small focus on social involvement (as it does include things like the dates of local city council meetings, etc.); events listed otherwise are LGBTQ+ friendly, LGBTQ+-focused, or put on by local LGBTQ+ orgs.

resources.title: Tri-Cities LGBTQIA+ Discord Server
resources.description: Link to the local LGBTQ+ Discord for the Tri-Cities, WA, and surrounding areas.
